segments.text: You should have seen the line at the housing office.It took me an hour to make my dormitory deposit for next year . Have you made yours yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I ’ m not sure I ’ m going to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? There ’ s not much time left . Are you short of cash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ d better hurry up if you wanna a dorm room next September ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , actually , I am thinking about living off campus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any idea how much that would cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know it would be more expensive . I think I could handle it though . It ’ s that this dorm is so noisy that I can ’ t get anything done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should study in the library the way I do . Think of the money you ’ d save .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve got to think it over some more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you will have second thoughts .
segments.speaker: S1
